Welcome

This weekly lab is a required component of Computer Science 227. The purpose of the lab is to give you a chance to try things hands-on, where there is a TA to answer questions. The topics presented in the lab will generally follow along with the lectures, but will also introduce some topics that are best introduced in a hands-on setting.

Goals for today

In today's lab, we want to make sure you can:
  • Find your files again when you need to submit an assignment
  • Access ISU-owned network storage for backing up your work
  • Create and run a simple Java program using the Eclipse development environment
  • Run a tool called the SpecChecker that will help to validate your assignments for this course
  • Submit an assignment on Canvas and verify that it was correctly uploaded

Before you begin, please take a minute to help us out by answering a few questions below
